attributes.action: Class Barbers/Hairdressers & Beauty as Essential shops & To stay open
attributes.background: Hair & beauty treatments are needed in order to make everyone feel better and for those that have no one to speak or listen. Due to this Pandemic Everyone needs to keep there heads high, Salons are known to be happy places having such a positive effect on ones mental health and state of mind.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555408
